title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 101.5 - Lawful deductions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 101.5 - Lawful deductions

State Regulations

Lawful, reasonable and necessary expenses incurred by such
superintendent in effecting such sale shall be deducted from the amount
received for each article of personal property sold in the proportion that each
such amount bears to the total amount received at such sale. After audit by the

State Comptroller, amounts so deducted shall be used by such superintendent to
defray such expenses. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
101.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
